It is a land crab endemic to Christmas Island in the Indian Ocean.

They normally live in burrows in the forest, but once a year all together (65 million crabs) leave and walk towards the coast to mate and lay their eggs. This takes at least a week. Males usually arrive before females.

At the end of the incubation period, the females emerge from their burrows and release their eggs into the ocean, during the high tide of the last quarter moon.

The adults then return to the forest, while the larvae spend 3-4 weeks in the sea and then return to the mainland as juvenile crabs.

During this annual migration, roads and villages are found completely covered by the walking crabs. To ensure the safety of crabs and humans, infrastructure has been built such as a five-metre high crab bridge, underpasses and aluminum funnels.

Al termine del periodo di incubazione, le femmine escono dalle loro tane e rilasciano le uova nell'oceano, durante l'alta marea dell'ultimo quarto di luna.

Gli adulti tornano quindi nella foresta, mentre le larve trascorrono 3-4 settimane in mare per poi tornare sulla terraferma come giovani granchi.

Stagosauruses lived from the Late Jurassic, herbivorous, characterised by the distinctive kite-shaped upright plates along their backs and spikes on their tails.

In tegenstelling tot huiskatten houden tijgers ervan om urenlang in het water te zwemmen. Er wordt gezegd dat ze meerdere kilometers kunnen zwemmen en er is zelfs een tijger waargenomen die 30 km zwom in slechts één dag.

De meeste kattensoorten hebben strepen op hun vacht en op hun huid. Het is zelfs zo dat het unieke strepenpatroon op tijgers net zo werkt als de vingerafdrukken van mensen. Zelfs als je de vacht van tijgers of huiskatten zou afscheren, zou je nog steeds de strepen zien.

The earliest known indication for the taming of an African wildcat (Felis lybica) appeared close by a human Neolithic grave in Cyprus, (7500–7200 BC), most likely brought the island from the Middle Eastern mainland by the people living there.

Scientists think that wildcats were attracted to human settlements to prey on the house mouse. Early farmers started then to tame cats but without major changes as they are still capable of surviving in the wild.

Differently from the one on dogs, in fact, the predatory trait has been useful for humans goals.

Scientists believe that polar bears diverged from brown bears that became isolated from the eastern part of Siberia.

Polar bears can breed with brown bears to produce fertile hybrids; rather than indicating that they have only recently diverged, the new evidence suggests more frequent mating has continued over a longer period of time, and thus the two bears remain genetically similar.

Although most polar bears are born on land, they spend most of their time on the sea ice.

That is why it is one of the strongest symbols for climate change as the ice caps are melting destroying rapidly their environment and possibility of living.

"

Gli scienziati ritengono che gli orsi polari si siano separati dagli orsi bruni che si sono isolati nella parte orientale della Siberia.

Gli orsi polari possono riprodursi con gli orsi bruni e generare ibridi fertili; anziché indicare che la loro separazione si sia verificata solo di recente, nuove prove suggeriscono che accoppiamenti frequenti si siano protratti per un periodo di tempo più lungo, e quindi le due specie rimangono geneticamente simili.

Sebbene la maggior parte degli orsi polari nasca sulla terraferma, trascorre la maggior parte del tempo sul ghiaccio marino.

Per questo motivo è uno dei simboli più forti del cambiamento climatico, poiché le calotte polari si stanno sciogliendo, distruggendo rapidamente il loro ambiente e le loro possibilità di vita.

The wolf is the largest extant member of the family Canidae.

It is most specialized for cooperative game hunting as demonstrated by its physical adaptations to tackling large prey, its more social nature, and therefore its highly advanced expressive behaviour.

The relationship between them are strong: typically once the alpha male and female breed mate stay together in any circumstance, often until the death of one of the two. Social bonds for their family and other loved ones are also super strong: they sacrifice themselves for the survival of the pack and family unit.

All ancient and modern dogs share a common ancestry and are descended from an ancient, now-extinct wolf which was distinct from the modern wolf lineage.

"
column16:

Il lupo è il membro più grande della famiglia dei Canidi.

È specializzato nella caccia cooperativa, come dimostrano i suoi adattamenti fisici per affrontare prede di grandi dimensioni, la sua natura più sociale e, di conseguenza, il suo comportamento espressivo altamente avanzato.

La relazione tra i due è forte: in genere, una volta che il maschio e la femmina alfa si accoppiano, rimangono insieme in qualsiasi circostanza, spesso fino alla morte di uno dei due. Anche i legami sociali con la famiglia e le altre persone care sono molto forti: si sacrificano per la sopravvivenza del branco e del nucleo familiare.

Tutti i cani antichi e moderni condividono un antenato comune e discendono da un antico lupo, ormai estinto, distinto dalla linea evolutiva dei lupi moderni.
